name: Educationnest
overview:
Everyday thousands of students make life changing decisions and choose a career path. Thus, the important part for every student’s life is the process of making these decisions and then achieving their goals. Education Nest aims to provide users with an easy to use educational network. We do not only provide students with information on courses and institutes but we also help them to prepare for a better future. Our services include providing e-books, tutorials, preparation tests and tips to help students through the process of enrollment and achievement of results.

What makes us different from the rest is that we provide a platform to bridge the communication gap between the education providers and students seeking information . We also provide a common forum for students to interact with each other through a concept of educational social networking which enables students to share their opinions and experiences.
